sentence: That certain Republicans like, you know, Liz Cheney or Adam Kinzinger, you know, they are not quite in the mainstream, but I've never heard people call the names that they are calling -- TURNER: Yes.

title: 'The Five' on struggles facing Democrats ahead of midterm elections

sentence: Salt Lake City (CNN)In a resolution formally censuring GOP Reps. Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger, the Republican National Committee on Friday described the events surrounding the January 6, 2021 insurrection -- which have been at the center of a House probe -- as "legitimate political discourse."
author: Gabby Orr
title: In censure of Cheney and Kinzinger, RNC calls events of January 6 'legitimate political discourse'

sentence: Addressing the RNC's censure vote on Reps. Adam Kinzinger (R-IL) and Liz Cheney (R-WY), she added, "They passed a resolution essentially calling January 6th 'legitimate political discourse.'
author: Tom Boggioni
title: A lot of Republicans 'want out of the Trump situation': CNN analyst

sentence: Continue reading WEGMAN EARNS NOD - House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy is endorsing Harriet Hageman in her Wyoming primary challenge to Rep. Liz Cheney, a rare move by a sitting party leader to back an attempt to unseat one of his members.

title: California's 'endemic' approach

sentence: Barr would not specify which Republican candidates he would get behind, although he told Tapper that he didn't believe Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) had any shot at actually getting the nomination.
author: Brad Reed
title: Bill Barr tells CNN he'll get involved in GOP primary to prevent Trump from winning nomination

sentence: Fox's Sean Hannity and Meadows had been texting since Election Day Earlier this year Rep. Liz Cheney read text messages between Meadows and several Fox News hosts during the Jan. 6 Capitol riot, including Sean Hannity.
author: Bart Jansen
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene said some lawmakers talked martial law after Jan. 6, according to texts released by CNN
